sentences.english: The development of the embryo sac is Polygonum type with numberous antipodal cells.
sentences.chinese: 胚囊的发育为蓼型，具多个反足细胞。

sentences.english: Starch grains present in the embryo sac and placenta are utilized by the embryo.
sentences.chinese: 存在于胚囊和胎座中的淀粉粒为胚所利用。

sentences.english: The mature embryo sac has seven cells.
sentences.chinese: 成熟胚囊内具七个细胞。

sentences.english: The embryo sacs observation is one of the main study method for embryology.
sentences.chinese: 胚囊观察是植物胚胎学的主要研究方法之一。

sentences.english: Wall ingrowths occurred in central cell at micropylar region near embryo sac wall.
sentences.chinese: 中央细胞在珠孔端与胚囊壁相邻的部位形成壁内突。

sentences.english: All nucellar cells disappear, when an embryo sac is ripe.
sentences.chinese: 属薄珠心，胚囊形成时珠心细胞全部消失。

sentences.english: The development of embryo sacs of 'Ziyingui' belonged to polygonum type.
sentences.chinese: 籽银桂的胚囊发育类型为蓼型。

sentences.english: The blastocyst is then surgically introduced into the uterus of a foster mother.
sentences.chinese: 然后通过手术把胚囊引进寄养母体的子宫内。

sentences.english: At the mature embryo sac stage, some nucellar cells at the chalazal region differentiated into hypostase.
sentences.chinese: 成熟胚囊期，合点端部分珠心细胞特化为承珠盘。

sentences.english: After fertilization through the micropyle, the zygote turned into dormancy status without certain time phase.
sentences.chinese: 成熟胚囊经珠孔受精后，合子休眠，休眠时间不确定。

sentences.english: The chalazal megaspore of a linear tetrad develops into a polygonum type sac.
sentences.chinese: 四分体线行排列，合点端的大孢子发育为蓼型胚囊。

sentences.english: The chalazal end megaspore develops into the embryo sac mother cell.
sentences.chinese: 合点端大孢子发育为胚囊母细胞。

sentences.english: Function megaspore is in the chalaza and the monosporic embryo sac is chenopodiad type.
sentences.chinese: 功能大孢子位于合点端，大孢子发育为蓼型胚囊。

sentences.english: Abnormal development was observed at tetrad and mature embryo sac.
sentences.chinese: 在四分体和成熟胚囊时期观察到了异常发育现象。

sentences.english: How does macrospore developed to embryo sac?
sentences.chinese: 大孢子如何发育成胚囊？

sentences.english: It is concluded that embryo sac sterility was the main reason for highly stable seedless characteristic of Lipeng No. 2 cultivar.
sentences.chinese: 因此，胚囊高度败育是丽椪2号产生无核的主要原因。

definition: yolk sac (ectodermal cells attaching fetus to uterus before the development of the placenta)
trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus)/trophoderm
